etymologies: late 19th century. From the name of Anders Jahan Retzius, Swedish naturalist + -an

definitions: A rare manganese-containing mineral which occurs as dark brown prismatic or tabular crystals.

notes.text: Retzian is an arsenate and hydroxide of manganese and cerium (sometimes with other rare earth elements), Mn₂(Ce, La, Nd)AsO₄(OH)₄. Crystal system: orthorhombic.
